Articles.Content:
553) Add a simulator to the simulation to see if your simulated spacecraft will work as expected under simulated conditions that approximate conditions simulated in the main simulation.

God I had to read that four times to figure out what you were saying, very good sir

570: Luddite kerbals that smash your rockets and question whether kerbals should go to space

Edited August 4, 2013 by Brapness
571: Add quickscoping, campers, and breakable windows!

572 Add tents, so my Kerbals can go camping on Laythe

Weather permitting of course..

573 add multiplayer wit wepons so wee caan pwn noob scrubs

Disclaimer: This is all in the name of sarcasm, in case you couldn't already tell.
574: Kerbal-Eating bunnies that light stuff on fire, swarm your spacecraft at take off so you have to accelerate fast enough not to be eaten, should be added.
575: Giant kerbals!!!
Is it just me or have 2/3 of these come true since the thread was started?

576 When research is added, allow for a secret tech tree that allows doomsday weapons

577 Is bacon available to Kerbals? If not, please make this a priority
578: A nearby neutron star.

579: A nearby black hole.

580: A nearby supernova.

581: A nearby galaxy.

582: Oh and monitor each kerbal dreams and aspirations and get points to buy makeup and jewelry when you fulfill their aspirations.

I'll wait for 0.22 oki thx
Way to revive a thread guys...

I really loled on this thread. honorable mention to Richy teh space man

582: Every ship part should be a cube.
583: Every planet is a cube.
584: Make the Kraken a visible entity that will travel the solar system and destroy player made objects with tentacles.
585: Cockpit panel hula girl

586: KSP for Kinekt!

ZodiaK. srsly.

#396: We should be able to name teh Kerbals!

That would actually be great.

591: Imperial units

592: If there was some kind of spectator mode in which I would join a friend's KSP and pl.... *bleeeeep*

584: Make the Kraken a visible entity that will travel the solar system and destroy player made objects with tentacles.
